<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow"> <sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>true</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>This flow will wait for a tracker to complete its progress on the provided instance and return the results of the tracker.</p> <p><b>Inputs:</p> </b> <ul> <li><b>Progress Id</b> - Sys Id of the sys_execution_tracker record.</li> <li><b>Instance URL</b> - The URL of the Instance where you wish to start the test suite .</li> <li><b>Credential Alias</b> - The Connection and Credential alias must be of type "Credential" and must have user with "sn_cicd.sys_ci_automation" role.</li> <li><b>Interval</b> - The time that the 'Action' in this flow periodically checks the progress of the tracker. You can add the interval either in days or hours or minutes or seconds. Default to 30 seconds.</li> <li><b>API Version</b> - This optional parameter allows the version of the related CICD REST API to be specified. When not present, the latest version of the API will be used.</li> </ul> <p><b>Outputs:</p> </b> <ul> <li><b>Status</b> - Will be set to "0", if the request is "Pending". Will be set to "1", if the request is in "Running" state. Will be set to "2", if the request is "Successful". Will be set to "3", if the request is "Failed". Will be set to "4", if the request is "Cancelled".</li> <li><b>Error</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> <li><b>HTTP Status</b> - The HTTP status code of the response</li> <li><b>Status Label</b> - The label corresponding to the 'status'. Will be one of "Pending", "Running", "Successful", "Failed", "Cancelled"</li> <li><b>Status Message</b> - More information on why the operation failed if available. Can be empty.</li> <li><b>Status Detail</b> - More details on why the operation failed if available. Can be empty.</li> </ul> <p><b>Error Messages:</p> </b> <ul> <li>User does not have access to CICD role</b></li> <li>Invalid Progress ID</li> <li>Unable to get the execution progress for the Progress Id</li> </ul> <p> To use this action, a corresponding CICD connection and credential must be created and associated with the Instance URL used above. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/search?q=Create+a+Connection+%26+Credential+alias">Learn More</a></p></description> <internal_name>wait_until_tracker_completes</internal_name> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>This flow will wait for a tracker to complete its progress on the provided instance and return the results of the tracker.</p> <p><b>Inputs:</p> </b> <ul> <li><b>Progress Id</b> - Sys Id of the sys_execution_tracker record.</li> <li><b>Instance URL</b> - The URL of the Instance where you wish to start the test suite .</li> <li><b>Credential Alias</b> - The Connection and Credential alias must be of type "Credential" and must have user with "sn_cicd.sys_ci_automation" role.</li> <li><b>Interval</b> - The time that the 'Action' in this flow periodically checks the progress of the tracker. You can add the interval either in days or hours or minutes or seconds. Default to 30 seconds.</li> <li><b>API Version</b> - This optional parameter allows the version of the related CICD REST API to be specified. When not present, the latest version of the API will be used.</li> </ul> <p><b>Outputs:</p> </b> <ul> <li><b>Status</b> - Will be set to "0", if the request is "Pending". Will be set to "1", if the request is in "Running" state. Will be set to "2", if the request is "Successful". Will be set to "3", if the request is "Failed". Will be set to "4", if the request is "Cancelled".</li> <li><b>Error</b> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> <li><b>HTTP Status</b> - The HTTP status code of the response</li> <li><b>Status Label</b> - The label corresponding to the 'status'. Will be one of "Pending", "Running", "Successful", "Failed", "Cancelled"</li> <li><b>Status Message</b> - More information on why the operation failed if available. Can be empty.</li> <li><b>Status Detail</b> - More details on why the operation failed if available. Can be empty.</li> </ul> <p><b>Error Messages:</p> </b> <ul> <li>User does not have access to CICD role</b></li> <li>Invalid Progress ID</li> <li>Unable to get the execution progress for the Progress Id</li> </ul> <p> To use this action, a corresponding CICD connection and credential must be created and associated with the Instance URL used above. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/search?q=Create+a+Connection+%26+Credential+alias">Learn More</a></p></description> <internal_name>wait_until_tracker_completes</internal_name>
